caption.p: Mechanism of bacterial polymer synthesis pathway. FAB: fatty acid de novo biosynthesis; FAD: fatty acid ฮฒ-oxidation; KDPG: 2-keto-3-deoxy-6-phosphogluconate pathway; NDP: nucleoside 5อด-diphosphate; P: phosphate; PGI: phosphoglucoisomerase; PGM: phosphoglucomutase; Pha: polyhydroxyalkanoate synthesis enzyme; TCA cycle: tricarboxylic acid cycle.
